actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs (without written report).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 95-960.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 12426, the New York City Loan Guarantee Act of 1978.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 12426 (New York City loan).

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 12426, the New York City Loan Guarantee Act of 1978.
